subscription.title: Periodontal Chart Premium Plan
subscription.benefits:
By subscribing to the Premium Plan, you can use the app without ads.
You can also share data with other apps by signing in.
(You need to use the same Apple ID.)
subscription.benefits_2: Ads will no longer be displayed, and you can share data with other devices by signing in. You can register from the settings screen at the top right.
subscription.auto_renewal_text: This subscription will auto-renew. You can cancel at any time from the App Store account settings at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
subscription.premium_join: By subscribing to the Premium Plan,
subscription.accept: you are deemed to have agreed to the terms and conditions and the privacy policy.
